cause.description:
In August 2005, the 8,000 residents of Gush Katif were evicted from their homes.
JobKatif is the only organization dedicated to helping former residents of Gush Katif and Northern Samaria find employment, set up businesses and return to self-sufficiency. JobKatif’s unique approach of outreach, support and faith in the individual has already succeeded in helping over 1000 people return to the workforce.
Become our partners in this urgent mission and help us in the highest level of Tzedekah – helping people help themselves. Assistance from people around the world makes our work financially possible and strengthens the people of Gush Katif spiritually. Please donate and be in touch to let us know how we can help you get involved.
1. JobKatif has succeeded in helping over 1000 people return to the workforce.
2. 1000 families are still suffering from unemployment or underemployment.
cause.mission: Help former residents of Gush Katif and Northern Samaria return to self-sufficiency.
cause.name: JobKatif
